com.esri.mo2.map.img
Interface Tile

All Superinterfaces:
Data
public interface Tile
extends Data

A Tile is an organizational and retrieval unit of a Cache. A Cache passes a Tile to an ImageServer's retrieve() method when the Cache determines that a new Image is required. The ImageServer is expected to try to obtain an Image defined by the Tile's ServerImage property.

Normally, the ImageServer will ask its associated ImageLayerSource to obtain an appropriate URL for this Tile. The ImageLayerSource may contact the remote ImageServer to obtain this, and in the process of doing so, the remote ImageServer may choose to change one or more of the Image characteristics - for instance the ImageServer may choose to disallow viewing data in a sensitive geographic region. If this situation arises, the ImageLayerSource can construct a different ServerImage and replace the proposed one using the setImage method.

See Also:
Cache, ImageServer.retrieve(com.esri.mo2.map.img.Tile), ImageLayerSource.getImageURL(com.esri.mo2.map.img.Tile)

Method Summary
 void cancel()
          this method is provided for ImageServer implementors, to be able to signal to the Cache that the data thus far retrieved should be cleared away.
 ServerImage getImage()
          obtain the actual ServerImage.
 ServerImage getProposedImage()
          obtain the proposed ServerImage
 void setImage(ServerImage image)
          change the actual ServerImage
 

Method Detail

cancel

public void cancel()
this method is provided for ImageServer implementors, to be able to signal to the Cache that the data thus far retrieved should be cleared away. This would typically occur if the ImageServer detected some kind of i/o error during the retrieval process.

getProposedImage

public ServerImage getProposedImage()
obtain the proposed ServerImage

Returns:
the proposed Image

getImage

public ServerImage getImage()
obtain the actual ServerImage. This will be the same as the ProposedImage unless an ImageLayerSource has modified this by calling setImage()

Returns:
the actual Image
See Also:
getProposedImage(), setImage(com.esri.mo2.map.img.ServerImage)

setImage

public void setImage(ServerImage image)
change the actual ServerImage

Parameters:
image - a new ServerImage
